model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
A new cat arrived at the shelter. He is very cute, but not cuter than puppies!
Why do you like puppies so much?  What's so different about kittens and puppies?  Aren't they just both babies?  
Yes but puppies are just so cute with their beady eyes and always wagging their tails and following you everywhere!
You have a point.  It is nice to see puppies wagging their tail and just following you!  Changing topics, do you have any recipes with asparagus?  You know, it's such a popular vegetable, but I just don't know how to prepare it.
I don't have recipes but I know how to make a good grilled asparagus. Are you looking to bolster your chef book?
I sure am!  Grilled asparagus does sound good.  Do you pair the grilled asparagus with your fajitas?  What do you prefer, chicken or beef fajitas?
I prefer chicken to beef. I pair it with beef fajitas andI think it's great to have with a glass of merlot. Do you like wine?
You're making me hungry!  Yes, I do love wine.  As a matter of fact, I used to live in the Bordeaux region in France, so my favorite wine is Bordeaux wine.  But I also love champagne and cognac.
Haha, I know right? I lived in the Champagne region for a bit! Always wanted to go to Bordeaux. How was it there?
I didn't know that you also lived in France for a while!  I love French food, especially the bread and fruit pastries.  Living in Bordeaux was fun!  I had the chance to visit all the prehistoric caves with paintings in the Southwest region of France.  Plus, Spain was just a few hours away by train, so I visited Spain quite a few times as well.  Oh, the good old times.  If only I were this excited about my career!
The French have the best food I have ever eaten plus the life style is so chill! I miss going to the bakeries in the mornings to get freshly baked baguettes and croissants. If you become a chef you could travel to different countries and workright?

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Potential Career Paths', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A suggests different career paths to Speaker B and they discuss working in the culinary field.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker B: I'm not really sure. I'm 26, so I'm just starting my career. ### Speaker A: Do you like puppies? I adore them! ### Speaker B: I don't really have an opinion on puppies. ### Speaker A: Has work still been really busy? Have you gotten a chance to take a break? ### Speaker B: Yeah I've been super busy. But I haven't been able to settle on a career just yet. Any recommendations? ### Speaker A: Well, you could always start a band. Or you could help me build my time machine! Maybe you could be a chef? ### Speaker B: That would be awesome! I would love to be your chef. Any particular favorite dishes? ### Speaker A: I prefer mexican food and seafood. Chicken enchiladas, tacos, shrimp shish kabob... Any baked fish. I like it all. If you are going to grill, maybe grilled corn and stuffed burgers ### Speaker B: Ugh that sounds like a plan. Maybe we can teleport around the world and I'll cook different types of cuisines?  ### Speaker A: Oh that would be the best thing ever! I love trying new food! Cooking is a science ya know! ### Speaker B: Ain't that the truth! Do you have any puppies by the way? ### Speaker A: I used to foster puppies, but I am too busy now to deal with them all the time. I do however visit shelters in every city I go to! ### Speaker B: Oh how cool. Are you an animal person? ### Speaker A: Of course! Puppies are my favorite, but dogs are cool too. It is nice to get to meet as many as possible while jumping from place to place. Maybe when I can move through space and time, I can go meet all the puppies from history!! ### Speaker B: But what about the kittens??? ### Speaker A: Have you had any time off for grilling? ### Speaker B: not really yet. I'm hoping I can grill this weekend though.  ### Speaker A: Do you have anything yummy planned out? It's raining here so I may do some indoor grilled veggies for fajitas. :) ### Speaker B: maybe some steaks. need to figure out a good side to go with it. ### Speaker A: Do you like grilled asparagus? I put a little lemon on mine and it's delicious.  ### Speaker B: I've never had it but definitely something to consider.  ### Speaker A: Usually people either really love it or hate it. Have you considered getting a job as a line cook? ### Speaker B: I've been wanting to get a job somewhere as a chef. I think it would be fun but I haven't had the time to try to find some place to apply to yet. ### Speaker A: It always looks fun, but for me, working nights, would be a drawback. ### Speaker B: most restaurants don't stay open too late. so it wouldn't bother me. ' }(2) {'Related Topics': 'Cooking and Food Preferences', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A and Speaker B share their food preferences and discuss potential collaborations in cooking.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: I prefer mexican food and seafood. Chicken enchiladas, tacos, shrimp shish kabob... Any baked fish. I like it all. If you are going to grill, maybe grilled corn and stuffed burgers ### Speaker B: Ugh that sounds like a plan. It is nice to get to meet as many as possible while jumping from place to place. Maybe when I can move through space and time, I can go meet all the puppies from history!! ### Speaker B: But what about the kittens??? ### Speaker A: Have you had any time off for grilling? ### Speaker B: not really yet. I'm hoping I can grill this weekend though.  ### Speaker A: Do you have anything yummy planned out? It's raining here so I may do some indoor grilled veggies for fajitas. :) ### Speaker B: maybe some steaks. need to figure out a good side to go with it. ### Speaker A: Do you like grilled asparagus? I put a little lemon on mine and it's delicious.  ### Speaker B: I've never had it but definitely something to consider.  ### Speaker A: Usually people either really love it or hate it. Have you considered getting a job as a line cook?' }
```
